title: Cognitive Engagement Activities
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want ALFRED to provide interactive cognitive games tailored to my patients' interests so that I can recommend activities that stimulate their cognitive functions and enhance their overall well-being.

title: Physical Activity Tracking
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to track my patients' physical activity levels so that I can encourage increased mobility and exercise.

title: Personalized Activity Suggestions
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want ALFRED to recommend physical activities tailored to my patients' abilities and preferences so that I can promote suitable options for their engagement and well-being.

title: Progress Monitoring for Activities
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to monitor the progress and participation of my patients in cognitive and physical activities so that I can provide tailored support and ensure their engagement.

title: Feedback Mechanism for Activity Effectiveness
summary: As a caregiver, I want to receive feedback on the activities my patients engage in so that I can adjust future recommendations to better meet their needs and preferences.

title: Guided Exercise Routines
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to initiate guided exercise routines for my patients so that they can safely engage in physical activities appropriate for their condition.
